snippet.title: Ace Ventura: The CD-ROM Game
snippet.description: Ace Ventura is a graphical adventure game developed by 7th Level and published by Bomico Entertainment Software in 1996. It's based on the animated television series Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, which in turn is based on the movie of the same name. In this game, you take the role of Ace Ventura, an eccentric 'pet detective', who helps animals in trouble.
